item.title: About Me
item.description: Meticulous Computer Software Engineer whose passions include developing software that improves current processes. Possesses practical knowledge in the design and implementation of software. Consistently meets deadlines and delivers high quality solutions. Enjoys learning and self guided research into programming related topics. Currently working as a scrum master and software engineer at Connexta in Phoenix, AZ.
